segments.text: Kim ! I'm here ! I brought all my old maternity clothes plus Dave and Alice's baby clothes !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a little early for those , isn't it ? I still have eight months to go ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Believe me , the time will fly by ! Before you know it , you'll be changing diapers ! You have to start preparing !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought we could turn the upstairs study into a baby room . What do you think about lavender ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll be back tomorrow with my work clothes and a gallon of lavender paint ! You just sit back and relax !
segments.speaker: S1
